title: (x) "J.M. Thomas" oblique 3D slab serif - Profil (Decorated 035) {Yves}
content:
Anybody know what this font is?

author: popinfresh

comments.content: [Second sighting](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119143605/http:/typophile.com/node/17346) in as many days of the 3D-licious Profil a.k.a. [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119143605/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream)’s [Decorated 035](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119143605/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.107530.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=J.M.THOMAS&sampleSize=24).
Hmmm, looks like the whole inline-outline thing didn’t survive the probable multiple reproductions.
